transportAdvice: Public buses connect most towns across the island but run on limited schedules. Taxis are widely available and often negotiated for full-day tours. Renting a car is the most practical way to explore the island at your own pace, as many beaches and attractions are spread out.

weather.description: Hot and humid peak of the wet season with frequent tropical showers and occasional cyclone risk.
Warmest month with heavy rainfall and high humidity; sea conditions can be rough.
Still hot and rainy as the wet season continues, though cyclone risk decreases toward month end.
Transitional month as conditions begin to dry out and temperatures gradually cool.
Pleasant and increasingly dry as the cooler season begins; comfortable for outdoor activities.
Dry season begins with mild, comfortable temperatures and pleasant trade winds.
Coolest month with dry conditions and refreshing breezes; ideal for hiking and exploration.
Dry and mild with excellent visibility for snorkeling and diving; one of the best months to visit.
Warming slightly with continued dry weather and calm seas, excellent for water activities.
Warm and mostly dry as summer approaches; a popular time for beach holidays.
Warm with increasing humidity and occasional afternoon showers as the wet season nears.
Hot and humid as the wet season returns with tropical showers, though festive holiday atmosphere prevails.
